title: Site de Location Saisonnière
description: This project involves creating a seasonal rental website (similar to AirBnB, VRBO, Booking, etc.) using HTML and CSS.

title: Site de Cinéma
description: A web application for displaying and searching movies available online. It offers a modern and intuitive user interface.

title: Projet Pokémon
description: SUPINFO World CLI Gaming asks you to develop a console (CLI) version of Pokémon in C, called Supémon.
